name: VITAMAX early access
description:
Take the fruit weapon and smash the badass !!

You are the commander of the space breeding shuffle, your only weapon is the giant fruits!

Features

Fast, fast and fast game speed! Let your adrenaline shot up! Now the turbo mode is avaliable

More than 40 enemies and 9 bosses, 8 ships, 16 power-ups and collection system, more stuff more fun!

Dynamic power-up system, make your own skill combine!

Mini power-up upgrade system

From normal to endless hell, give you a hardcore arcade style

Clever enemies make a good team to attack you

Don't need much time to play a round, as a hard casual game.

More features at later update

Control========

W,A,S,D------move

Left click----normal fire

Right click----super fire

Q,E,F-----skill( passive skill can not be use when you press, it effect auto)

Space----switch skill slot

R-----reduce powerup coldtime

G-----Suicide(test only)

You can close shader in extra option

Turbo mode

Escape----pause

Developed by Y!kescloud

Shader is created by xygthop3 and KeeVee Games,

and thanks to their free sharing!

Menu BGM is Unreal Superhero 3 by Rebel

BGM collection by Chipzel http://chipzel.co.uk

Sound by schademans
